      • addSubscriber

        public void addSubscriber(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String fullName,
                          int age,
                          int consumptionHours,
                          int numCustomerLevel)
        Description: in this method we will add a subscriber type object to the subscriber class
        Parameters:
        id - String, it represents the id of the suscriber.
        fullName - String, it represents the full name the suscriber.
        age - int, it represents the age of the suscriber.
        consumptionHours - int, it represents the hours that the suscriber is willing to consume of the channel.
        numCustomerLevel - int, it represents represents a number that corresponds to a customer level

      • addFilm

        public void addFilm(java.lang.String productName,
                    java.lang.String movieDirector,
                    java.lang.String synopsis,
                    int day,
                    int month,
                    int year,
                    java.lang.String producer,
                    int minimumAge,
                    int numCategory)
        Description: in this method we will add a film type object to the product class, because by inheritance this object can behave as a subclass.
        Parameters:
        productName - String, it represents the name of the product (film).
        movieDirector - String, it represents the name of the director (film).
        synopsis - int, it represents the abstract of the product (film)
        day - int, it represents represents the day when the product was released.
        month - int, it represents represents the month when the product was released.
        year - int, it represents represents the year when the product was released.
        producer - String, it represents the name of the producer of the product.
        minimumAge - int, it represents the recommended age to watch the movie.
        numCategory - int, it represents a number that identifies the category movie of the film.

      • addSerie

        public void addSerie(java.lang.String productName,
                     java.lang.String movieDirector,
                     java.lang.String synopsis,
                     int day,
                     int month,
                     int year,
                     boolean censoredSerie,
                     java.lang.String razonCensored,
                     int numActors,
                     int num,
                     int scheduledEpisodes,
                     int publishedEpisodes,
                     java.lang.String pathTrailer,
                     java.lang.String[] auxActors)
        Description: in this method we will add a serie type object to the product class, because by inheritance this object can behave as a subclass.
        Parameters:
        productName - String, it represents the name of the product (film).
        movieDirector - String, it represents the name of the director (film).
        synopsis - int, it represents the abstract of the product (film)
        day - int, it represents represents the day when the product was released.
        month - int, it represents represents the month when the product was released.
        year - int, it represents represents the year when the product was released.
        censoredSerie - boolean, if censoredSerie = true the serie has been censored, else the serie hasn´t been censored
        razonCensored - String, if censoredSerie = true, it represents the razon why the serie was censored.
        numActors - int, it represents the number of principal actor that has the serie.
        num - int, it represents the number of one season(Season 1, Season 2 ..etc).
        scheduledEpisodes - int, it represents the amount of scheduled episodes of the serie.
        publishedEpisodes - int, it represents the amount of published episodes of the serie.
        pathTrailer - String, it represents the link to the video of the thrailer.
        auxActors - String [], it represents an auxiliary array where the name of the actors are saved .

      • thereIsSpaceForSubscriber

        public int thereIsSpaceForSubscriber()
        Description: in this method we will ckek if there is a space in the object array for subscribers
        Returns:
        pos int, if pos = -1, there isn´t a space in the array else there is space and we can save a new suscriber.

      • verifyIdExist

        public boolean verifyIdExist(java.lang.String id)
        Description: in this method we will ckek if the id that the user enter has been already registered before.
        Parameters:
        id - String, it represents the id that the user entered
        Returns:
        out boolean, if boolean = true then the id has been already registered else the id hasn´t been alreayd registered

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        out boolean, if out = true then the subscriber exists else the subscriber does not exist.

      • thereIsSpaceForProduct

        public int thereIsSpaceForProduct()
        Description: in this method we will ckek if there is a space to save a new product
        Returns:

      • verifyNameExist

        public boolean verifyNameExist(java.lang.String productName)
        Description: in this method we will ckek if the name of a new product has been registered.
        Parameters:
        productName - String, it represents the name of the new product.
        Returns:
        out boolean, if out = true the name has been already registered, else the name hasn't been registered.

      • thereIsntProducts

        public boolean thereIsntProducts()
        Description: in this method we will ckek if there are not products registered in the system.
        Returns:
        out boolean, if out = true there are not products registerdes in the system else there are at least one product registered in the system.

      • createAnewSeason

        public java.lang.String createAnewSeason(java.lang.String productName,
                                         int scheduledEpisodes,
                                         int publishedEpisodes,
                                         java.lang.String pathTrailer)
        Description: in this method we will add a new season of a serie.
        Parameters:
        productName - String, it represents the name entered of the serie entered by the user.
        scheduledEpisodes - int, amount of scheduled episodes of the new season.
        publishedEpisodes - int, amount of published episodes of the new season of the serie
        pathTrailer - String, it represents the link of the thrailer of the serie
        Returns:
        out String, it contains the message of the process' result

        Returns:

      • showAllSeriesAndItsLastSeason

        public java.lang.String showAllSeriesAndItsLastSeason()
